Questions.Question: Which movie features the quote 'May the Force be with you'?
Questions.Explanation: The quote 'May the Force be with you' is from the movie Star Wars, a popular science fiction franchise.

Questions.Question: In which movie does the character say 'I'll be back'?
Questions.Explanation: The quote 'I'll be back' is famously said by the character played by Arnold Schwarzenegger in The Terminator.

Questions.Question: Which movie features the quote 'Here's Johnny!'?
Questions.Explanation: The quote 'Here's Johnny!' is from the movie The Shining, directed by Stanley Kubrick.

Questions.Question: In which movie does the character say 'You can't handle the truth!'?
Questions.Explanation: The quote 'You can't handle the truth!' is from the movie A Few Good Men, starring Tom Cruise and Jack Nicholson.

Questions.Question: Which movie features the quote 'I'm the king of the world!'?
Questions.Explanation: The quote 'I'm the king of the world!' is from the movie Titanic, directed by James Cameron.

Questions.Question: In which movie does the character say 'I see dead people'?
Questions.Explanation: The quote 'I see dead people' is from the movie The Sixth Sense, directed by M. Night Shyamalan.

Questions.Question: Which movie features the quote 'Life is like a box of chocolates'?
Questions.Explanation: The quote 'Life is like a box of chocolates' is from the movie Forrest Gump, starring Tom Hanks.

Questions.Question: In which movie does the character say 'I'm going to make him an offer he can't refuse'?
Questions.Explanation: The quote 'I'm going to make him an offer he can't refuse' is from the movie The Godfather, directed by Francis Ford Coppola.

Questions.Question: Which movie features the quote 'You talking to me?'?
Questions.Explanation: The quote 'You talking to me?' is from the movie Taxi Driver, directed by Martin Scorsese.

Questions.Question: In which movie does the character say 'I love the smell of napalm in the morning'?
Questions.Explanation: The quote 'I love the smell of napalm in the morning' is from the movie Apocalypse Now, directed by Francis Ford Coppola.

Questions.Question: Which movie features the quote 'Houston, we have a problem'?
Questions.Explanation: The quote 'Houston, we have a problem' is from the movie Apollo 13, based on the true story of a space mission.

Questions.Explanation: The quote 'I'm king of the world!' is from the movie Titanic, directed by James Cameron.

Questions.Explanation: The quote 'There's no place like home' is from the movie The Wizard of Oz, based on the novel by L. Frank Baum.

Questions.Explanation: The quote 'I feel the need...the need for speed' is from the movie Top Gun, starring Tom Cruise.
